column4: hey guys, noob question, i want to install fiesty on my primary box, but dual boot winxp. I have winxp installed on C: already, but i want to partition c: without losing my info to install fiesty? How can i do that?
first defrag your Windows drive in order to reduce it's size.
after defragging, how can i partition my c: without losing info?
is Windows using the entire disk?
